sentences.en: According to another view, originated in China Table ancient tribal totem signs.
sentences.cn: 另一种意见认为, 华表起源于远古时代部落的图腾标志.

sentences.en: Ancestors of the Zhuang ethnic group had a frog as a totem.
sentences.cn: 壮族的先民曾以青蛙作为图腾.

sentences.en: Davidson says he's the lowest man on the Ranger totem pole.
sentences.cn: 大卫森说他是骑警阶层最低的.

sentences.en: Earthbind Totem : This totem will no longer break Rogue stealth.
sentences.cn: 地缚图腾: 不再会使盗贼脱离潜行状态.

sentences.en: I am the slow man on the totem pole.
sentences.cn: 在这方面可能我天生就比别人慢吧,呵呵.

sentences.en: I didn't want to be low man on the totem pole for ever.
If you're guarding a totem, hunters on the long - range shooting you.
sentences.cn: 如果你守着图腾, 猎人就远程射击你了.

sentences.en: It also reflects the shadow of the original totem worship.
sentences.cn: 这其中也折射出原始图腾崇拜的影子.

sentences.en: It had totem poles, masks, beadwork , basket and prints.
sentences.cn: 里面有图腾柱 、 面具 、 镶缀珠 、 篮筐以及版画.

sentences.en: Shaman : Earthbind Totem will now immobilize all Rogues in the same zone.
sentences.cn: 萨满: 地缚图腾将对所有该地图内的盗贼起定身作用.

sentences.en: The North American Indians used to make totem poles.
sentences.cn: 北美印第安人过去常建造图腾柱.

sentences.en: The phoenix worship of China is fetish worship not totem adoration.
sentences.cn: 中国凤崇拜是灵物崇拜而非图腾崇拜.

sentences.en: This opera is one of the cultural totems of Western civilization.
sentences.cn: 这部歌剧是西方文明的文化标志之一。

sentences.en: Totem is one of the very antiquated primitive religion forms.
sentences.cn: 图腾是一种古老的原始宗教形式.

sentences.en: Tremor Totem now pulses every 3 seconds , down from 4.
sentences.cn: “战栗图腾”现在3秒生效一次(原来是4秒).

sentences.en: Vindication: This effect will no longer be absorbed by Grounding Totem.
sentences.cn: 辩护: 该效果不再被根基图腾吸收.

trans.tran_en: an animal, plant etc that is thought to have a special  spiritual  connection with a particular tribe, especially in North America, or a figure made to look like the animal etc
